## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem you're trying to solve. What is currently difficult, frustrating, or impossible?

Example: "When setting up a new project, I have to manually configure X every time, which takes Y minutes..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature or change you'd like to see. Be as specific as you can.

## Alignment with Viflo Philosophy

How does this feature fit the Viflo approach?

- [ ] Supports Planning-First methodology
- [ ] Improves hybrid model strategy (better task routing)
- [ ] Reduces cost or increases velocity
- [ ] Improves AI agent context quality
- [ ] Enhances developer experience

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches did you think about? Why do you prefer your proposed solution?

## Implementation Notes

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, share them here. This is optional — it's fine if you just know what you want, not how to build it.

## Willing to Implement

- [ ] Yes, I'm willing to open a PR for this
- [ ] I can help test it, but not implement
- [ ] I'm just suggesting — happy for someone else to take it
